CODIF_DATA.TY_TYPE_BID: Submission for one or more lots
CODIF_DATA.MA_MAIN_ACTIVITIES: Production, transport and distribution of gas and heat
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 016EA

CONTENTS.P: Yderligere supplerende oplysninger
III.2.1 Information to be moved to VI.3 Additional Information

The text in Section III.1.4) "Organisations must have an office in the UK for the purpose of managing the contract or provide an undertaking that one would be established should a contract award be made. Applicants must be able to provide the minimum threshold of cover specified for the lots they wish to be considered for." to be moved to III.2.2)
